title: ‘Warzone 2.0’ impressions: Good riddance, Caldera. Hello, Al Mazrah.
description: The new Call of Duty battle royale map rekindles the feeling of first dropping in Verdansk.

title: ‘Warzone 2.0’s’ new battle pass, explained
description: 'Call of Duty: Warzone 2.0' and 'Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II' use a new grid-based battle pass system, eschewing the linear format from previous seasons.

title: TSM suspends $210 million naming rights deal after FTX woes, rocky year
description: The relationship between TSM and FTX hit multiple speed bumps before the exchange collapsed.

title: Musk testifies in Delaware, defending his massive Tesla pay
description: Elon Musk took the stand Wednesday in a trial over his role at Tesla and the propriety of a pay package that helped to make him the world's richest person.

title: ‘V Rising’ lights the way forward for the survival game genre
description: An ode to the marvelous implementation of a novel mechanic.

title: Microsoft wants you to play Minesweeper with your boss. No, really.
description: Microsoft’s new Games for Work app allows workers to play four games together during meetings on its communications service Teams.

title: Oversight Board tells Meta to restore post comparing Russians to Nazis
description: Meta’s independent Oversight Board overturned the social media giant’s decision to remove a Facebook post, likening Russian soldiers to Nazis.

title: How to watch the World Cup on a budget
description: Here's how to watch or stream the 2022 World Cup — even if you don't have cable.

title: Musk issues ultimatum to staff: Commit to ‘hardcore’ Twitter or take severance
description: It comes as Musk’s first major feature, Twitter Blue Verified, was halted while the company probes issues that arose from its launch.

title: NASA begins U.S. return to the moon as its huge SLS rocket finally flies
description: The SLS cost billions to develop and most of it was ditched at sea. But it successfully sent an Orion capsule on its way to the moon in the first step in the plan to return astronauts to the lunar surface.

title: Musk issues ultimatum to staff: commit to ‘hardcore’ Twitter or take severance
description: “If you are sure that you want to be part of the new Twitter, please click yes on the link below,” read Elon Musk's email to all staff.
